captions.text: Girl on right: So what's your prescription like? Girl on left: Oh these aren't real, I just think they look cute.
It was you in the vestibule wasn't it?

title: The 7 Worst Things About Wearing Glasses

comments.text: Don't forget 3D movies...two pairs of glasses are the worst﻿
comments.author: Francesca B.

comments.text: YES﻿
comments.author: Mia The Nerd

comments.text:
Or the fact that my glasses lift up my laid down straight hair and it looks 
FUCKING HORRIBLE﻿
comments.author: Kleines Kätzchen

comments.text:
When I take my glasses off, they ask me how many fingers they're holding up 
or they ask if I can see them and I'm like "I'm not blind you know."﻿
comments.author: Alex97s

comments.text:
When I sneeze on a cold day my glasses get so foggy that I would walk in to 
a tree!!!!﻿
comments.author: rita dogg

comments.text: I cant even lay down on my side without my glasses being out of place. ﻿
comments.author: Relly Kelly

comments.text:
Don't forget this horrible scene;

Classmate: Why do you need glasses?
Me: I'm nearsighted. Things get blurry after 30 cm.(1 foot.)
Classmate: *Takes* *my* *glasses* *off* *of* *my* *face* *Stands* *across* 
*room* How many fingers am I holding up?
Me: (None in a minute.) Um...a peach coloured blob?

Or these horrors:

-Are you blind?
-What would you do if I broke these?
-Can I try them on?
-Them saying: So...you're blind then... After you explain about your eyes 
-_-
-The fingerprints all over the lenses that were spotless 10 seconds ago! 


The struggle is real -_-﻿
comments.author: Land Shark

comments.text:
The worst thing is when its a rainy cold day and you go on the bus or train 
and everyones body heat fogs up your glasses, AH!!! Hate them days.﻿
comments.author: afszcb

comments.text:
When you sleep with the glasses and the next morning they have a lot of 
scratches.﻿
comments.author: I Am Anonymous

comments.text: Im going to get glasses soon and im going to experience this?!? oh no -.-﻿
comments.author: LiEll 엠버

comments.text: I can relate coz I use glasses. 😂﻿
comments.author: Miley Ray

comments.text: So true with the imposters ugh I hate those kind of people lol﻿
comments.author: Robin Brown

comments.text:
I hate movies that require 3d glasses(like iMAX). It's so hard to align 2 
pairs of glasses on your face properly, and even if I somehow manage to do 
that, my face and eyes hurt too much for me to enjoy the movie.
I usually try to find cinemas without that crap, but sometimes I can't 
avoid it.﻿
comments.author: Rinso

comments.text: You forgot 3D movie watching... with 2 glasses﻿
comments.author: ‫רוני איתן‬‎

comments.text:
One time my glasses broke at school during lunch (we can go across the 
street to the mall for lunch) so i wasn't with my friends i had to get back 
to school almost blind (includes crossing the rode) and i had to go to the 
office where they called my dad and he wouldn't come pick me up because 'it 
wasn't a big deal' so then the office tried to fix my glasses and the lady 
was like "are they just for fashion or do you really need them" like bitch 
if i only wore them for fashion why would i go to the office about it and 
call my dad, so then they couldn't get my glasses fixed so i had to go all 
day blind and i had to copy notes and then worst of all i had to know when 
to get off the bus without being able to see where we were....﻿
comments.author: Allthe Lushvideos

comments.text: cool stuff﻿
comments.author: Oluwajoba Odesanya

comments.text:
My friends are somethimes like: "O, can I wear your glasses ones? To see 
how it looks?" And then i'm like: "No other ways I can't see anything"

Or that they ask how it looks without glasses. I'm like: "Blurry?" I mean, 
you can't explain it in annoteer way.

Or just during PE. I just keep them on, other ways i'm like: "Where is the 
ball and who is holding it?"﻿
comments.author: Els E

comments.text:
trust me it really stinks..my eyesight is like 350...dude wtf i started 
having glasses wen i was in kingdergarden!﻿
comments.author: judy ng

comments.text:
I only need my glasses when I read or  I'm on my computer. What a pain in 
the ass . Put gasses on for a while then take em off. And just keep 
repeating. Then forgetting where you put them when you need them.﻿
comments.author: dsspike51

comments.text:
I HATE cleaning my glasses. I don't really cary my cleaner, and if I'm not 
wearing the right shirt, they are impossible to clean. Also, when you go 
outside, your glasses make your nose really sweaty, if you have the right 
glasses﻿

comments.text:
On the up side every time you take off your glasses is like a whole new 
world! :D﻿
comments.author: Laura Groza

comments.text:
I hate letting my friends using my glasses unless there letting me use 
theres﻿

comments.text:
I hate it when people wear fake glasses. You think this is cool? You think

You mofo﻿

comments.text: AND WHEN IT'S RAINING...﻿

comments.text: CHALENGE! how many bronie hater we will find in the comments﻿
comments.author: Maya Takanashi

comments.text:
Me: Yea I wear glasses
Idiot: So... you're blind?
Me: no
Idiot: *takes glasses* HOW MANY FINGERS AM I HOLDING UP
me: uhh three
Idiot: WHAT THEN WHY DO YOU NEED GLASSES
me: .. I can barely see without them
Idiot: *wears my glasses* OMG HOW CAN YOU SEE IN THESE *gives back to me 
and in the meantime touches lens and smudges it*
me: *sigh*﻿
comments.author: Sarah Forrester

comments.text:
"Hey can I try out your glasses?"
You say yes because saying no is impolite.
"WOAH YOU'RE BLIND"
Nod your head because you've been through this tons of times.
"Oooohhhhh the lenses are kinda curved!"
Don't touch them please oh god don't let them-
*Touches lenses*
YOU GO APE SHIT﻿
comments.author: Sabo Yaqi

comments.text:
I hate not being able to enjoy a hot cup of tea, a cup o' noodles, or be 
able to go back inside my house in the winter without having my glasses fog 
up.﻿

comments.text: MLP!!!﻿

comments.text:
I hate when people try on my glasses and they are like: WOW, I CAN'T SEE 
WHERE IS MY BOOK!
or:
TAKE OFF YOUR GLASSES! HOW DO YOU SEE?
or:
OLD FRIENDS STARRING AT YOU WHEN YOU WEAR YOUR GLASSES
But don't worry! People who are wearing glasses are really pretty!﻿

comments.text: Peoples with glasses are so cute! Most of my friends wear glasses.﻿
comments.author: spd7693

comments.text:
I'm not sure if others get this but sometimes my hair gets caught in the 
hinges of my glasses and it hurts so bad.
Then there are those moments when you forget you're not wearing glasses and 
then reach up to fix them only to realize they're not there.﻿

comments.text:
I have transitions on my eyeglasses, so the sunglasses issue doesn't happen 
to me.﻿

You also cannot close your mouth with your scarf in winter because the

comments.text: This sums up my whole freakin' entire life﻿
comments.author: A.Selma Baki

comments.text: Get contacts... so much easier﻿
comments.author: theoneandonlyuniqueme

comments.text:
My eyesights a little below average, (as in things get slightly blurry a 
few meters away) and it gets annoying when I have to take them on and off 
constantly.. especially when someone's far away in the school halls and I. 
Ant recognise them. At least trees are detailed now. :D﻿
comments.author: Channel I Stole From My Sister

comments.text:
People wearing fake glasses bother me so much. My poor vision is not a 
fashion statement, plus my glasses can be really uncomfortable.﻿
comments.author: jt27891

comments.text: Yup hot tea always gets me﻿
comments.author: Maya Rosales

comments.text: I just wear my glasses in the shower﻿
comments.author: Rick Cantu

comments.text: I can't even be dramatic! I can't see without them XD﻿
comments.author: Gaby M

comments.text:
Oh, yeah....and news flash: we can't all get contacts! If losing glasses 
happens daily, how would I ever find lost contacts? Not to mention the 
annoying glare from any light source, the fogging when you come into a warm 
room after being in freezing temperatures, and dating out glasses-wearing 
people. Clink!﻿
comments.author: TheClumsyJedi

comments.text:
Rain, 3D glasses, Headphones, Trying to watch a movie while laying sideways 
on your bed are also really fucking annoying!﻿
comments.author: WANTZiN

comments.text:
laying down on your side and watching youtube vids only to find that your 
glasses are placed crooked.﻿
comments.author: Julia Gray

comments.text:
At least my friends know how blind I am, but it's still annoying when they 
borrow my glasses and then complain that they got an headache...dude my 
vision is 120/20 and you knew that, why did you still do it?????

My glasses make my eyes look really small and I've been told it makes me 
look uglier, but I was told (no second opinion) that even laser surgery 
wouldn't fix my vision, only make it possible for me to wear contacts :c﻿
comments.author: YokoFujioka

comments.text: people who like fake glasses are retards ok?﻿

comments.text:
You forgot one. The time when we wear glasses and it starts raining.

happen , plus u really can't enjoy rains.﻿

comments.text: it doesn't help that I look like Velma.﻿

0:58 GURRRR! My glasses always blur when hot steams come! >:(
0:45 I saw only once when somebody was wearing something that looked just

comments.author: Ruby Phan

comments.text:
I don't use glasses but my dad does and every time he takes his glasses off 
I would take them and say to my dad "can I ?" And he would say "sure! But 
don't break it" so I use his glasses and walk around the house and say "its 
not blurry at all!" And I would try every glasses that my friends have and 
say the same thing they would always say "wooaah...." I even tried my 
teachers glasses... And sorry for my bad English cause I'm not from the USA 
or UK or something like that I live in Malaysia...﻿
comments.author: Karen De Run

comments.text:
This helped a lot since I'm getting glasses soon because I'm long

comments.author: Michaela Robertson

comments.text:
A usual day for me...

Me: *chillin, minding my own business.*
Random person I dont even like: *rips of my glasses from my face and tries 
them on*
Me: dude, what was that for?
Person: oh, I forgot my glasses at home. Can I use yours for the rest of 
the day?
Me: SRSLY!? 1) my perscription in 3.5 and -4.5, I AM BLIND WITHOUT THEM, 
GIVE THEM BACK 2) how in the name of the holy name of cheese do you FORGET 
YOUR GLASSES AT HOME 3) DONT TOUCH MY LE
Person: *touches lenses, smudging them*
Me: I just cleaned them, you son of a bitch!﻿
comments.author: Soo Min Han

comments.text: What about when your caught in the rain??﻿
comments.author: larrivids2015

comments.text: There wasn't shown what is it like to use glasses in the rain.﻿
comments.author: Silver fox

comments.text:
400$ for a pair of glasses?? They really know how to rip someone's money 
bag off. I wear a pair worth like almost 10 bucks and I've worn it for over 
3 years.﻿
comments.author: Ha Ran Jung

comments.text:
+Ha Ran Jung Yep.. they really know. 
I have strong astigmatism with myopia. Regular lenses looks like bottoms of 
the Champagne bottles. If i want to keep my nose in right place (and i want 
to) i have to buy Hi-Index aspheric lenses. These can significantly reduce 
the thickness and weight of the lenses. 
A pair of these with anti-scratch, anti-reflective coating, best UV filters 
and impact resistance costs me 280 Euros. And these are not the best.
So now comes The Frames moment. 
It's obvious that i can't spend ten Euros for frames for that kind of 
lenses. At least 100 Euros seems to me okay. 
Approx. 400 Euros for eyeglasses it's like wearing PS4 on your nose.
comments.author: Maphio Saphio

comments.text: To wipe your specs put water on the lenses then wipe﻿

comments.text: i remember once i took glasses off, i was so blind :( like it was so blurry﻿

I used to wear glasses but i have 6.5 in one eye and 0.5 in the other. I

comments.author: Lety Perez

comments.text: Omg I have all those same problems I have glasses﻿
comments.author: Marisa Esparza

comments.text:
Well these are a pain in the ass but I do prefer this instead of contacts
The things I hate about when wearing glasses are. Smudges, smudges 
everywhere! And when people borrow it they touch the freaking glass! Like 
seriously?! can you not see the handles on that thing?! Oh yeah and about 
that contacts I planned on giving it a try but...never mind! One day my 
friend brought her contact lens,just for fun she doesn't have anything 
wrong with her eye. And i of course we all wanna try,just like methen I 
made a gross theory that maybe once you put the contacts on it'll roll back 
at the back of your eye making them all cringe,but of course they ignored 
me, and it was fun not until a few days later. She brought back her 
contacts and said she wanna to try it,bit its hard to put it on cause her 
eyes are small and kept blinking. Once it finally got on her eye she 
blinked and asked"did you guys even put it on?" And all of us looked at her 
and NOT seeing the contacts in her eyes,we started panicking we looked for 
it if it fell somewhere cause we're not gonna make conclusions. And me I 
just panicked that what I just said came true,so my friend decided to look 
at my friend's eye,and to pur surprise...it was IN her eyes where you can't 
see it anymore cause it's covered by the eyelids and what I said came true 
like oh my god! I was panicking and shit! But luckily they manage to take 
the contacts out of her eye while me and in the background"nah...I ain't 
wearing none of that shit anymore"....and that's when I stated to fear 
contact lenses so I rather stick to glasses from now on...well maybe﻿
comments.author: RandomJ Gurl

comments.text:
1. When people try on your glasses and are like 'I can see perfectly'
2. The blind jokes.
3. When you lose them.﻿

comments.text: And smudges on glasses are SO annoying. ﻿
